thread.title: Windows 10 Cumulative Update KB3081455 Also Failing to Install
thread.title_full: Windows 10 Cumulative Update KB3081455 Also Failing to Install - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Windows 10 Cumulative Update KB3081455 Also Failing to Install
text: KB3081455 is the latest cumulative update for Windows 10 and was released earlier this month on Patch Tuesday, as in addition to performance improvements and other optimizations, it also includes security fixes that were released to PCs running older Windows versions. But just like its predecessors, KB3081455 fails to install on a number of PCs, with most users reporting error 0x80070002 when trying to get it deployed on their computers. For the moment, Microsoft is yet ... Â»
